TopicTitle: Mod that has a docking port adapter docking port?

Articles.Content:
Well I've always kind of wondered: why is there no "adapter" docking port? - A docking port that has an initial form factor of 2.5m, however which can also "dock" with the smaller ports.

 

This would be ideal for utility ships around larger stations, to move modules around and not having to worry about the correct port for the "utility ship". (the utility ship would have this adapter).

Theres:

Universal Docking Ports -have their own models/textures

and

Multiports -which re-use stock models/textures. This one is just a collection of simple part cfg files, so its a *small* mod, easily modified/customized, and should work in just about *any* version of KSP. I can verify this one works in 1.7.3 and 1.8.1. It can be easily whitelisted so it can be used with ReStock, too. (not sure about Ven's Revamp, tho)
